oai_dc:dc.dc:title: META-R (Multi Environment Trail Analysis with R for Windows) Version 5.0
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alvarado, Gregorio
López, Marco
Vargas, Mateo
Pacheco, Ángela
Rodríguez, Francisco
Burgueño, Juan
Crossa, José
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Maize and Wheat Improvement Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Statistical analysis
BLUP
BLUE
Genetic Correlation
Multi Environment
R program
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: META-R is a set of R programs that performs statistical analyses to calculate BLUEs, BLUPs, genetic correlations among locations and genetic correlations between variables, broad-sense heritability, and other statistics for breeding trials are given too, in order to make boxplots and histograms. Analyses may be performed by location, across management conditions or across all locations. META-R contains a graphical JAVA interface that helps the user to easily choose input files, which analysis to implement, and which variables to analyze.
